name: Comms Agent - Customer Service Inquiry -> Correct Team Member

parameters.content: ## Check Completed Board & Route To Team
## Check & Route Issue to Overseas Team
## Check & Route issue to Local Team
## Check Transfer Queue & Route Issue to Local Team W/Split Logic

parameters.message:
=

Hello {{ $('Gmail Trigger').item.json.from.value[0].name.split(" ")[0].toSentenceCase() }},

Adam from Dad's Printing here. I'd like to make this right and get this sorted, so I am forwarding you to your order manager Jacob.

Team, {{ $('Gmail Trigger').item.json.from.value[0].name.split(" ")[0].toSentenceCase() }} from order {{ $('Search Completed').item.json.column_values[0].text }} had concerns regarding their order which are summarized here:

{{ $json.message.content }}

Can we lend them a hand?

 

Adam Lando
1-833-879-3237 EXT 700
info@dadsprinting.com

The content of this email is confidential and intended for the recipient specified in message only. It is strictly forbidden to share any part of this message with any third party, without a written consent of the sender. If you received this message by mistake, please reply to this message and follow with its deletion, so that we can ensure such a mistake does not occur in the future.
Unsubscribe

parameters.content:
# Customer Service Forwarder Automation
**Watch Loom here [Guide] ## (https://www.loom.com/share/be7bb83937924d6cb97ec01e2dc8fcf8)

parameters.subject: ={{ $('Gmail Trigger').item.json.subject }}
parameters.message:
=

Hey {{ $('Gmail Trigger').item.json.from.value[0].name.split(" ")[0] }}, Adam from Dad's Printing here.

For some reason, I'm not able to find your order in the system, is there another name or email that it might have been submitted under?

Let me know, I'd like to help if I can. Thanks!

Cheers,
 

Adam Lando
1-833-879-3237 EXT 700
info@dadsprinting.com

The content of this email is confidential and intended for the recipient specified in message only. It is strictly forbidden to share any part of this message with any third party, without a written consent of the sender. If you received this message by mistake, please reply to this message and follow with its deletion, so that we can ensure such a mistake does not occur in the future.
Unsubscribe
